CustomField.description: The marketable name for an official Academic Program (or group of Programs) that the individual is interested in. A lookup to Program with a filter criteria of Record Type = Recruitment Program. Used in building the Opportunity Key for the Interaction Processor to determine whether to create a new Opportunity or update an existing Opportunity for a decentralized recruitment process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The marketable name for an official Academic Program (or group of Programs) that the individual is interested in.
CustomField.label: Recruitment Program
